Quick search

TCPSocket module¶

class TCPSocket.TCPSocket(ip, port=None)[source]¶

Bases: MySocket.MySocket

A class that represents a TCP connection with a specified host. Wraps around an actual socket.socket, and implements send and receive methods for easier usage.

receive()[source]¶

A method that waits until it receives a message and returns that message, along with the IP address of the sender.

Return type:tuple
send(msg)[source]¶

A method that sends a message through the socket.

Parameters:msg (str) – The message to be sent.
